content.rendered:
SalamAir is a low-cost airline from Oman headquartered and based at Muscat International Airport. It was established on 2016.

SalamAir Baggage Allowance

List of SalamAir Offices:

Nepal – Kathmandu

Georgia – Tbilisi

Iran – Shiraz

Pakistan – Multan

Pakistan – Sialkot

Pakistan – Karachi

Qatar-Doha

UAE-Dubai

Al khuwair – Muscat

Tehran – Iran

Salalah – Oman

Dhaka – Bangladesh

Jeddah – Saudi Arabia

Al qudah – Egypt

Kuwait city – Kuwait

Khartoum – Sudan

Riyadh – Saudi Arabia

Dammam – Saudi Arabia

Istanbul – Turkey

Manama – Bahrain

Colombo – Srilanka

Abu dhabi – UAE

Calicut – India

Delhi – India

Queries handled by SalamAir Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the SalamAir Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the SalamAir: (click on the stars below)
